dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Did you know Sofia Vergara made a staggering 75% more than the second-highest paid TV actress last year?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Did you know Sofia Vergara made a staggering seventy five percent more than the second-highest paid T V actress last year?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's insane—$42.5 million, right? And Kaley Cuoco was at $24.5 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's insane-forty two point five dollars million, right? And Kaley Cuoco was at twenty four point five dollars million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million Primary Show: Modern Family 2. Kaley Cuoco $24.5 million Big Bang Theory

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. But what's wild is how different their income streams are. Like, almost half of Vergara's came from endorsements—SharkNinja Coffee, Rooms To Go…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. But what's wild is how different their income streams are. Like, almost half of Vergara's came from endorsements-SharkNinja Coffee, Rooms To Go...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday. Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Her manager called their endorsement department a "well-oiled machine." Meanwhile, uh, 95% of Cuoco's earnings were just from Big Bang Theory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Her manager called their endorsement department a well-oiled machine. Meanwhile, uh, ninety five percent of Cuoco's earnings were just from Big Bang Theory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our endorsement department is a well-oiled machine. By contrast, 95% of Cuoco's earnings can be attributed to her role on Big Bang Theory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is still huge, even after she and the guys took a pay cut to, um, help out newer cast members like Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is still huge, even after she and the guys took a pay cut to, um, help out newer cast members like Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, they both tied at number six with $12 million each. But then you've Ellen Pompeo at number three—$23.5 million from Grey's Anatomy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, they both tied at number six with twelve dollars million each. But then you've Ellen Pompeo at number three-twenty three point five dollars million from Grey's Anatomy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3. Ellen Pompeo $23.5 million Grey's Anatomy 4. Mariska Hargitay $13 million Law & Order: SVU 5. Julie Bowen $12.5 million Modern Family 6. (tie) Mayim Bialik $12 million Big Bang Theory 6. (tie) Melissa Rauch $12 million Big Bang Theory

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And she negotiated a producer fee on Station 19 too. She basically said, like, when you help generate billions for a corporation, you deserve a piece.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And she negotiated a producer fee on Station nineteen too. She basically said, like, when you help generate billions for a corporation, you deserve a piece.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19. When your face and your voice have been part of something that's generated $3 billion for one of the biggest corporations in the world, you start to feel like, 'OK, maybe I do deserve a piece of this,' Pompeo told The Hollywood Reporter in January.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Smart move. And then Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen round out the top five, both making their money purely from their shows, no endorsements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Smart move. And then Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen round out the top five, both making their money purely from their shows, no endorsements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rounding out the top five are Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hargitay (No. 4, $13 million) and Modern Family's Julie Bowen (No. 5, $12.5 million). Both forgo endorsements and instead make their cash on screen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how some rely on branding outside the show and others don't. Claire Danes came back on the list this year too, at number nine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how some rely on branding outside the show and others don't. Claire Danes came back on the list this year too, at number nine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Returning to the ranking is Homeland's Claire Danes (No. 9, $9 million), who last appeared on the list in 2014.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, $9 million from Homeland. And overall, the top ten earned $168.5 million combined—up from last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, nine dollars million from Homeland. And overall, the top ten earned one hundred sixty eight point five dollars million combined-up from last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year. Returning to the ranking is Homeland's Claire Danes (No. 9, $9 million), who last appeared on the list in 2014.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, three actresses fell off: Robin Wright, Mindy Kaling, Priyanka Chopra. Fewer roles, smaller paychecks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, three actresses fell off: Robin Wright, Mindy Kaling, Priyanka Chopra. Fewer roles, smaller paychecks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Three actresses dropped off the ranking: Robin Wright, Mindy Kaling and Priyanka Chopra. Wright did not have any new House of Cardsepisodes in our scoring period while Kaling's The Mindy Projectconcluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you realize how volatile TV earnings can be, even at the very top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you realize how volatile T V earnings can be, even at the very top.
